snippet.title: Zapling Bygone Trailer (Switch, PS4/PS5 Asia)
snippet.description:
Wear the skulls of your fallen foes and steal their abilities!

Zapling Bygone is a twisted side-scrolling “metroidvania” action-adventure presented in fluid pixel art style! Use Zapling’s sticky tentacles to jump and climb around intertwined tunnels and tricky underground chambers across 6 unique biomes, each with their own enemies, bosses and backstory. Hunt down the big baddies, kill them and wear their skulls to absorb new skills and gain access to their memories, unlocking comic strip cinematics recalling major events in their lives. Find game-changing mutations to modify and enhance your abilities, trade plasma for ancient keys and more!

© JanduSoft SL, 9FingerGames. Licensed to and published by Eastasiasoft Limited. All Rights Reserved.
